phrases: It is been six months since we parted company.
It looks like you have gotten a little better.
Now then, how about I start training you properly?
Do not lose sight of your opponent!
I cannot see anything that fast.
That is easy for you to say...
If you have got enough time to whine, think about what you should do instead.
We have only got six more months!
When you are not eating or sleeping, you will fight me!
The end still are not in sight?
Just how long will it be until you train us?
We have already been here for two months, and yet you have not taught us anything.
We want to get stronger, like Goku.
Please give us the same special training that you gave Goku!
If that is the case, there is no reason for us to have come all the way here at all.
It is'zactly the same as training down on the surface.
Tell us, just what kind of training did Goku do here?
We just want to get stronger.
Getting stronger... is knowing enemy, and knowing self.
Do that, and what you should do come naturally.
Knowing the enemy, and knowing oneself?
I know better than anyone what my strength is!
I do not need to be told!
W- what kind of room is this?
You go on time journey now.
I will wait for ya's here.
Those want to go, enter circle.
These happened during some kind of battle.
The people on this planet appear to like fighting something fierce.
I am raring to take them on.
I am ready to have a go at them.
I would like to try out my strength.
All four of them together have a battle power of 1507.
None of them appear to be all that strong, huh?
What do you say we rough them up?
There is not a single person around, is there?
Maybe they are scared of us.
If this really is the Saiyan's planet,
we definitely should not take them lightly.
Okay, who is going to face us next?
Okay, now it is your turn.
That did not hurt one bit.
This time, all three of us will go at them!
It looks like we took care of them.
At this point, I will let them have it, even if it costs my own life!
We have laid two of you to rest.
Who is going to be third?
Before you do that, let me show you to your graves!
It is almost like they were undying monsters!
You have just been standing there the whole while.
Kami- sama let you have valuable experience in minds.
How did it go with the Saiyans?
What are ya keeping quiet for?
The Saiyans that you saw were still only half as strong as full-fledged ones.
They do not even compare to the strength
that Saiyans who are now heading for Earth possess.
You mean, they are even stronger?
Do you feel like running away now?
I am going at it, too!
I am going to train here for the next six months to defeat the Saiyans!
I am just itching to kill you!
The fated time is drawing ever nearer.
